'''Michael Coleman''' may refer to:

*[[Michael Coleman (actor)]] (born 1973), Canadian performer, voice of numerous anime characters
*[[Michael Coleman (author)]] (born 1946), English writer of books for children and young adults; candidate for the 1996 Carnegie Medal 
*[[Michael Coleman (baseball)]] (born 1975), American outfielder
*[[Michael Coleman (bishop)]] (1902–1969), Anglican bishop
*[[Michael Gower Coleman]] (1939–2011), Roman Catholic bishop of Port Elizabeth, South Africa
*[[Michael Coleman (blues musician)]] (born 1956), American blues guitarist 
*[[Michael Coleman (hurler)]] (born 1962), Irish retired hurler 
*[[Michael Coleman (musician)]] (1891–1945), Irish-American fiddler
*[[Michael B. Coleman]] (born 1954), American politician, mayor of Columbus, Ohio
*[[Michael Coleman (The Walking Dead)]]
